attributes.action: Make Lillianna the Winner of BGT 2023
attributes.additional_details: Because it was an unjust decision.
attributes.background: Allow for a re-vote of the BGT 2023 Final.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who wins talent shows are a matter for their organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
